parameters/description/P_VERBOSE_LEVEL: Log level for output (from 100 to 600; see Monolog logger documentation).
parameters/description/P_LOG_LEVEL: Log level for log file (from 100 to 600; see Monolog logger documentation).
parameters/description/P_SIMULATE: Simulate. Will output commands to STDOUT.
parameters/description/P_LIMIT: Limit amount of processed files by value.
parameters/description/P_FROM: Download photos from this path. Can be used multiple times. All positioned parameters also parsed like this option. Usage dash '-' to read paths from STDIN. All specifically passed files are processed as single files, not as bunch.
parameters/description/P_TO: Upload photos to this path. Use dash '-' to keep photos in place and only rename.
parameters/description/P_NO_SUBDIRS: Do not create directory structure in to-path.
parameters/description/P_COPY: Copy photos instead of moving them. This option is ignored, if source and destination paths (including subdirs) of file are equal.
parameters/description/P_NO_DELETE_DUPLI: Do not delete found duplicates (MD5 sums are compared).
parameters/description/P_AUTHOR: Set author token to this value. If not specified, then author token is not changed. If empty, then author token is removed.
parameters/description/P_CAMERAS: Process photos from specified cameras (space/comma separated list; repeatable). Use empty value to process all photos.
parameters/description/P_TOKENS_ADD: Add these tokens to new filenames (space/comma separated list; repeatable).
parameters/description/P_TOKENS_DROP: Drop these tokens from new filenames (space/comma separated list; repeatable).
